mapper.select: SELECT t.teacher_no ,s.student_no ,esa.exam_student_apply_no ,e.exam_no ,s.name ,e.year ,e.grade ,e.semester ,e.exam_type ,esa.create_date ,t.teacher_name ,esa.update_date FROM exam_student_apply esa INNER JOIN exam e on e.exam_no = esa.exam_no INNER JOIN student s on s.student_no = esa.student_no INNER JOIN teacher t on t.teacher_no = esa.create_teacher_no WHERE s.student_no = #{studentNo} limit 0, 100

SELECT e.exam_no ,sc.school_no ,sc.school_name , sc.area , e.grade , e.semester , e.exam_type , t.teacher_name , e.start_date , e.end_date , s.subject_no , s.subject_name FROM exam e INNER JOIN school sc on sc.school_no = e.school_no INNER JOIN teacher t on t.teacher_no = e.create_teacher_no and e.update_teacher_no INNER JOIN subject s on s.subject_no = e.subjectNo WHERE e.grade = #{grade} LIMIT 0, 10;

select s.student_no ,sub.subject_no ,esd.exam_student_detail_no ,e.exam_no ,s.name ,e.grade ,e.semester ,e.start_date ,e.end_date ,sub.subject_name ,esd.perfect ,esd.score from exam_student_detail esd inner join exam e on e.exam_no = esd.exam_no inner join student s on s.student_no = esd.student_no inner join subject sub on sub.subject_no = esd.subject_no where s.student_no = #{studentNo}
